SEARCH
Package com.game.gui.scenes.game

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.game.gui.scenes.game.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class serves as the main controller for the game logic and interactions. It manages the game flow, including loading the scene, handling user inputs, controlling the game loop, and rendering updates.

    boolean
    isOnPause()
     
    void
    loadMainMenu()
    Loads the main menu scene by delegating the call to the SceneManager.
    void
    onKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
    Handles the key press events and triggers corresponding player actions mapped to specific keys.
    void
    onKeyReleased(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
    Handles the key release events and triggers corresponding player actions mapped to specific keys.
    void
    render()
    Renders the game by passing the current game state, including tiles, spawners, blocks, entities, and player spawners, to the GameView for display.
    void
    restart()
    Restarts the game by resetting the view, regenerating the model, and starting the game loop.
    void
    start()
    Starts the game by initializing the game loop, showing the game view, and spawning the initial entities in the scene.
    void
    stopLoop()
    Stops the game loop, pausing all ongoing gameplay updates and rendering.
    void
    togglePause()
    Toggles the pause state of the game and pauses or resumes the game loop accordingly.
    void
    update(double deltaTime)
    Updates the game state by progressing the timer and model state based on the elapsed time since the last update.

  • Method Details

    • restart

      public void restart()
      Restarts the game by resetting the view, regenerating the model, and starting the game loop.

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game by initializing the game loop, showing the game view, and spawning the initial entities in the scene.

    • stopLoop

      public void stopLoop()
      Stops the game loop, pausing all ongoing gameplay updates and rendering.

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause()
      Toggles the pause state of the game and pauses or resumes the game loop accordingly.

    • loadMainMenu

      public void loadMainMenu()
      Loads the main menu scene by delegating the call to the SceneManager.

    • render

      public void render()
      Renders the game by passing the current game state, including tiles, spawners, blocks, entities, and player spawners, to the GameView for display.

    • update

      public void update(double deltaTime)
      Updates the game state by progressing the timer and model state based on the elapsed time since the last update.
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - The time elapsed since the last update, in seconds.

    • onKeyPressed

      public void onKeyPressed(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent keyEvent)
      Handles the key press events and triggers corresponding player actions mapped to specific keys.
      Parameters:
      keyEvent - The KeyEvent representing the key press input.
